tag_list: reliance, reliance-industries-limited, ril-board, ril-board-of-directors, pms-prasad, ril-pms-prasad, ril
overview:
PMS Prasad is the executive director at Reliance Industries Limited, India’s largest private sector enterprise. Reliance Industries Limited is a Fortune Global 500 company with businesses in the energy and materials value chain.

Shri PMS Prasad has been with the Reliance Group of companies for about 30 years. He was appointed as the Executive Director of the company with effect from August 21, 2009. Currently, he heads RIL’s Upstream and Refining business, which deals with exploration, production and refinery supplying and trading. Previously, he was the Project Director of the Jamnagar refinery and petrochemicals complex. In the past, he has held several positions in RIL’s fibers, petrochemicals and petroleum business. He plays an instrumental role in all major projects of Reliance Industries Limited.

Shri PMS Prasad is a Director of Reliance Commercial Dealers Limited and several other private limited companies. He is also a member of the Audit Committee of Reliance Commercial Dealers Limited. He is on the Board of Governors of the University of Petroleum and Energy Studies, India.

Shri PMS Prasad has acquired Bachelor’s degree in Science and Engineering. The University of Petroleum Engineering Studies, Dehradun has awarded him an honorary doctorate degree for his outstanding contribution to the Petroleum Sector. The Energy Executive of the Year 2008 award was conferred upon him by Petroleum Economist.
